channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Cities around the world welcome 2026 with thunderous fireworks and heightened security
item.description: From Sydney to Paris to New York City, crowds have rung in the new year with exuberant celebrations filled with thunderous fireworks, while others have taken a more subdued approach.
